overview: Aiming to be an in-depth study of hooliganism (both in act and in what it is to be one), director Donal MacIntyre, a former undercover journalist who was once under assignment as a hooligan himself, asks why hooliganism came to be and also why, of all sports, itâ€™s so closely associated with football (http://moviefarm.co.uk).
title: Hooligan
